summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1958, for the improvement of East Boston Street, from 15th Avenue North to 13th Avenue North, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins, and their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, and including a temporary out-fall along 15th Avenue North to Lake Union; under Ordinance No. 20320 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
